name: Under Loch Morar
description:
Under Loch Morar is a colorful onslaught of lovecraftian death pixels.  

Brave the frigid waters as you descend 30,000 kilometers to find the slumbering creatures that lurk beneath Loch Morar.

Cling to chaos, dodge colors, survive the madness. 

If you play the demo it would be helpful to fill out this quick 6 question survey: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/5VMHBQG
